name: Dungeon Boss Fight
description:
Fight your way to the very end in this boss fighting game with a weapon rogue-like progression system. Each weapon has it's own strengths and weaknesses and so does each boss, so try your best to survive til the end.

Game made for the first Miz Game Jam with a friend of mine in under 48 hours. This was our very first game we made and we learned a lot this jam. We hope to make more games in the future and we hope that you enjoy playing this one.

Sounds by Zapsplat, www.fesliyanstudios.com, and Sound Bible

Music

Kevin MacLeod ~ Killing Time

[No Copyright Music] In Light Of Darkness - (Royalty Free Epic Music)

[No Copyright Music] Dark Man - (Royalty Free Epic Music)

🔥 Epic Battle Music (No Copyright) "Dragon Castle" by Makai Symphony 🇯🇵
